llm_text:
Why: The model flagged this transaction primarily because payment_format_ach = 1 strongly increased the model score (SHAP +2.91302). High transaction size — amount_paid = 12682.5 (SHAP +0.84398) and amount_received = 12682.5 (SHAP +0.78266) — further increased the score. The receiving institution (to_bank = 12) also contributed positively (SHAP +0.68890). The sending institution (from_bank = 11157) produced a negative contribution (SHAP -1.00545), partially offsetting the increases.

Conclusion: Net effect of the dominant drivers (ACH method + large amounts + to_bank = 12 versus a mitigating from_bank effect) led the model to flag the transaction. If needing next steps, consider verifying ACH routing/details and recipient bank (to_bank = 12) relative to the payment amounts, given the positive contributions noted above.
